wikipedia_page.main: Wendy Lloyd Pasmore, née Blood (9 October 1915 – 2015) was a British artist.

response: In 1940, he married the artist Wendy Blood.Tate: Wendy Pasmore | Tate, accessdate: 22 August 2014 They had two children, a son and a daughter.bookroomartpress.co.uk: Pasmore, Victor Biography, accessdate: 22 August 2014 He died in Gudja, Malta, on 23 January 1998, aged 89.
